theVacant:VacantStarterRelic.NAME: Wretched Gem
theVacant:VacantStarterRelic.FLAVOR: A cursed trap that contains your soul.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, if you are #ythevacant:Healthy, lose #b2 Max HP. If you are #ythevacant:Wounded, gain #b4 Max HP. You can't go below #b50 Max HP this way.

theVacant:Deathbell.NAME: Deathbell
theVacant:Deathbell.FLAVOR: The scent invokes a feeling of dread.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you are #ythevacant:Wounded, whenever you #ythevacant:Mill, #ythevacant:Mill an additional #b2.

theVacant:BrassGoblet.NAME: Brass Goblet
theVacant:BrassGoblet.FLAVOR: An ancient artifact with dark power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, if you are #ythevacant:Healthy, gain #b1 #yDexterity. If you are #ythevacant:Wounded, gain #b2 #yStrength.

theVacant:BoundSoul.NAME: Bound Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 #ythevacant:Will. At the start of your turn, if you have no #ythevacant:Will, gain #b1 #ythevacant:Will.
